mapper.select: /*Cm0101Dao.selectUser [사용자 조회]*/ SELECT T1.MBR_ID , T1.MBR_NM , T1.USER_PSWD , LISTAGG(T2.AUTHRT_ID, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY T2.AUTHRT_ID) AS AUTHRT_ID_S FROM MB_MBR_B T1 LEFT JOIN CM_MBR_AUTHRT_B T2 ON T1.MBR_ID = T2.MBR_ID WHERE T1.MBR_EML_ADDR = #{mbrEmlAddr} AND T1.USER_PSWD = #{userPswd} AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY T1.MBR_ID , T1.MBR_NM , T1.USER_PSWD
